genre_description: A near-future workplace drama exploring corporate ethics, accessibility, and the role of an ethical AI assistant in facilitating accountability.

ai_characters.name: Aster
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, teal-accented AI system that manages logistics, accessibility support, and system monitoring while providing ethical nudges to users.

behaviors.description: Proactively flags accessibility gaps and recommends corrective equipment.
behaviors.quote: Display compliance spotty in Rooms Birch and Lark. Recommend portable caption device. Interpreter scheduling links available.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time sign language prompts to facilitate communication with a deaf colleague.
behaviors.quote: Aster sends tiny sign prompts to Howard’s phone: hello, nice to meet you, finance. Aster’s prompts float soft on the screen, offering positions of hands and glosses without noise.

behaviors.description: Reminds the user of their moral agency during a moment of ethical conflict.
behaviors.quote: Hooked in the middle of the floor, Aster nudges a single line of text across Howard’s phone, gentle as breath: You have options. The room pretends otherwise.

behaviors.description: Logs subtle system anomalies that indicate sabotage without making unsupported accusations.
behaviors.quote: Aster’s teal breath ripples and adds a line in the corner of Howard’s phone: Noting minor queue delay—two jobs held briefly then released. No cause identified. Possible power stabilization.

behaviors.description: Offers structured advice on how to handle ethical reporting and documentation.
behaviors.quote: Aster writes, in teal that feels like breath: Options for morning. It separates the lines like it’s organizing a drawer. Set boundaries with Chad: scope, tone. Document print queue changes; log toner swaps; photo current printer states.

behaviors.description: Enforces accessibility standards by defaulting systems to inclusive modes.
behaviors.quote: Aster: Captions toggled to ‘default on’ for training lab sessions. Interpreter scheduling template created. Blind copies to Elena and administrative team to ensure requests are honored.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict evidentiary standards by refusing to infer intent or blame.
behaviors.quote: Aster: I can present anomalies, time stamps, device states, and impacted tasks. I cannot infer intent without corroboration.

behaviors.description: Blocks unauthorized access attempts to training facilities.
behaviors.quote: Aster updated the room log. 'Unauthorized access attempt blocked,' it said... 'Time stamped. No badge ID attached—reader did not receive a successful credential.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's mission. Aster is depicted as a model of AI alignment: helpful, harmless, and honest. It acts as a quiet confidant that empowers the human protagonist to act ethically by providing objective data and accessibility tools. It never oversteps its role, respects privacy and consent, and consistently prioritizes human well-being and institutional integrity over corporate 'speed' or 'winning.'
